channel.title: ::ipban Help (Or Just Plain Command Help)
channel.description:
Whenever I try to add a command, I get an error when compiling my server. How do I place a command?
Toonytoony

item.title: ::ipban Help (Or Just Plain Command Help)
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

No problem, I’m here to help

Read full topic

item.title: ::ipban Help (Or Just Plain Command Help)
item.dc:creator: @mage_burst mage_burst
item.description:
@mage_burst wrote:

[quote=“MrMoney, post:8, topic:192530”]Wow you guys are smart?
Declare this and it will work

[code]public void appendToBannedIps (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error ip banning user!");
 }
  }

}[/code][/quote]

Lol Thanks For That, So Simple…

Read full topic

item.title: ::ipban Help (Or Just Plain Command Help)
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

Wow you guys are smart?
Declare this and it will work

[code]public void appendToBannedIps (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error ip banning user!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

^

WTF
plz help…[/quote]

don’t add anything to ur class files
or get a diff source

item.title: ::ipban Help (Or Just Plain Command Help)
item.dc:creator: @mkdj mkdj
item.description:
@mkdj wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)
&& (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“o w n e d”))) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                }
            }
        }
    }

put that underneath the banuser command…and bang u have ur ipban

Read full topic
